author: Reuters Editorial
title: Casualty toll from Afghan blast reaches 31 killed: official
text:
KABUL (Reuters) - The casualty toll from a suicide blast at a voter registration center in the Afghan capital Kabul on Sunday rose to at least 31 killed and 54 wounded, a health ministry spokesman said.
Clothes and sandals are seen at the site of a suicide bomb attack in Kabul, Afghanistan April 22, 2018.REUTERS/Omar Sobhani There has been no claim of responsibility for the blast but the Taliban have denied involvement.
Reporting by Qadir Sediqi; Editing by Robert Birsel
